definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: The tests showed emulsifier effect markedly on comprehensive performance of core-shell emulsion and coating film.
sentences.chinese: 研究表明，乳化劑對乳液及塗料綜合性能影響顯著。

sentences.english: In addition , the choices of the emulsifiers system and the catalyst are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 該部分着重討論了複合乳化劑體系和催化劑的選擇。

sentences.english: Synthetic detergents replaced the soap with emulsifying agents, such as sodium lauryl sulphate.
sentences.chinese: 合成洗滌劑乳化劑如十二烷基硫酸鈉取代了皁粉。

sentences.english: Nearly two-hundred manufacturers have so far been found to have used the emulsifier.
sentences.chinese: 到目前爲止發現大約200家廠商使用了這種乳化劑。

sentences.english: Polyether is often used as pharmaceutical excipient and emulsifier because of its low toxicity.
sentences.chinese: 聚醚毒性很低，常用作藥物賦形劑和乳化劑。

sentences.english: It is useful for the design and application of the polymerisable emulsifiers.
sentences.chinese: 對設計和使用可聚合乳化劑具有一定的指導作用。

sentences.english: Synthetic fatty acid used as an emulsifier.
sentences.chinese: 用脂肪酸合成作爲乳化劑。

sentences.english: Then use cotton swabs soaked with isopropyl alcohol to clean between keys, as well as the phone body.
sentences.chinese: 然後使用沾過乳化劑的棉花棒清理按鍵以及手機機身。

sentences.english: Can be used as a single self-emulsifier, particularly suitable for ordonnance low viscosity emulsion .
sentences.chinese: 可作爲單一的自乳化劑，尤其適合配置低黏度乳液。

sentences.english: Beeswax acts as an emulsifying agent.
sentences.chinese: 蜂蠟起到乳化劑的作用。

sentences.english: Although it is a fatty substance, it is also a fat emulsifier.
sentences.chinese: 它雖然是不飽和脂肪酸的物質，它也是一個胖乳化劑。

sentences.english: A new method of synthesizing emulsifier was developed.
sentences.chinese: 研究開發了一種新的乳化劑的合成方法。

sentences.english: In addition the company also produces a variety of pesticide emulsifier and synergist.
sentences.chinese: 另外本公司還生產各種規格的農藥乳化劑和增效劑。

sentences.english: This paper reported a study on the synthesis of silicone-acrylic emulsion with no emulsifiers .
sentences.chinese: 本文在無乳化劑下合成了硅丙乳液。

sentences.english: Water-resistant, free of oils, emulsifiers and fragrance.
sentences.chinese: 防水，不含油分，乳化劑和香料。
共乳化劑及乳液增稠劑。
